item.title: The 10 Best Movies in Theaters Right Now
item.description: 2024 continues to bring many exciting movies to theaters from all genres and for different tastes, ensuring there's always something for everyone.

item.title: The Wizard Of Oz's Cut Song & How It's Still Referenced In The 1939 Movie
item.description: Despite one particular song being cut from The Wizard of Oz, the 1939 movie still managed to make a subtle reference to it throughout the story.

item.title: I Understand Why Marvel Deleted Deadpool 3's MCU Timeline Retcon Scenes, But I Still Need It To Happen
item.description: An early Deadpool 3 concept would have focused on deleted scenes, and while I understand this was a good idea, there's still a future opportunity.
